autoconfiguration_failed.message: Autoconfiguration failed - autoconf service not found.

autoconfiguration_succeeded.message: Autoconfiguration succeeded, number of clients were setup:

capture_left_mouse_clicks.message: Capture left mouse clicks on torrent files

directory_selection_title.message: Choice type of directory selection for your torrent

download_error.message: There was an error downloading the file.

download_not_torrent.message: Downloaded file is not a torrent.

edit_directories_before.message: Select download directory before uploading the torrent

export_confirm.message:
This will access your logins/passwords for torrent sites stored in Firefox and will export them to the selected seedbox.

Proceed?

export_success.message: Logins and passwords were successfully exported.

exporting_to_seedbox_desc.message: You can export your login details from your browser to your seedbox's rutorrent so you don't have to type them manually. If you use this option, a list of supported sites for which you have a password stored in your browser will appear, and you will be able to select which one to export. No info will be sent until you explicitly approve it.

ext_description.message: This extension adds options to .torrent files to upload them automatically to a number of popular BitTorrent clients.

forced_for_all_links.message: Forced for all links (required to support magnet links)

full_path_to_the_seedbox.message: Full path to the seedbox, including protocol (http or https), server name, port number and the client path.

keep_track_of_promo.message: Notify me of new Xirvik products

label_selection_title.message: Choice type of label selection for your torrent

max_seedbox_reached.message: You can have a maximum of 20 server records.

mime_confirmation1.message:
Warning: Your Firefox is configured to silently save .torrent files to your hard drive. This means you will not be able to upload them to your seedbox.

Would you like to change the setting so you are asked what you want to do with torrents files from now on?

mime_confirmation2.message:
Warning: Your Firefox is configured to pass .torrent files to the external application. This means you will not be able to upload them to your seedbox.

Would you like to change the setting so you are asked what you want to do with torrents files from now on?

new_version.message: New version of Xirvik's seedbox extension is available

only_host_name.message: Only host name of your seedbox. Without protocol, port number and the client path.

password_for_the_above.message: Password for the above user name.

paste_your_xirvik.message: Please paste your Xirvik welcome e-mail below

permanent_directory_title.message: Enter here download directory for your torrent.

permanent_label_title.message: Enter here label for your torrent.

remove_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove this server?

rutorrent_options_hint.message:
html: You may use several macros in predefined mode:
  • {HOST}
  • {TRACKER}
  • {DATE}

seedbox_data_found.message: Seedbox data  found in your Xirvik preferences. Overwrite?

seedbox_incorrect_path.message: Seedbox doesn't seem to contain the correct path. Proceed anyway?

seedbox_url_hint.message:
html:URL to access the bittorrent UI you want to upload to.

For example, if your server was dedi010.xirvik.com and you wanted to upload via rutorrent then the URL would be https://dedi010.xirvik.com/rtorrent.

Keep in mind that each provider may use naming schemes different to Xirvik's. Please contact your provider if you have questions about configuring this extension for their service.

to_create_server_record.message: to add a new Xirvik server.

type_of_client.message: Type of client this setting uses. Note: it should conform to seedbox URL.

user_name_registered.message: User name registered on the server.

Dont_add_tname.message: Don't add torrent's name to path

you_can_check_tutorial.message: You can check our plugin tutorial

webui_password_title.message: Enter here password for Deluge WebUI
